value.title: Azure Portal “How To” Series
value.excerpt: Welcome to our weekly series that highlights specific aspects of the Azure portal so you can be more efficient and productive while deploying your cloud workloads from the portal.

topItems.title: How to get a visualization view of your resources | Azure Portal Series
topItems.excerpt: In this episode of the #Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to easily view a summary of your resources using different visualizations such as how to view all your resources on a map.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com  Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/pHFgmuF0gSg" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: How to manage applications in Azure Kubernetes Service | Azure Portal Series
topItems.excerpt: In this episode of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to use the new Kubernetes resources view experience for #Azure Kubernetes Service to quickly deploy and debug your Kubernetes applications.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com  Keep connected on Twitter:
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YfARHb52Bp4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: How to get started in Azure using the Azure Quickstart Center | Azure Portal Series
topItems.excerpt: In this episode of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to get started with your first project in #Azure using the Azure Quickstart Center.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com  Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal  And make sure
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/mb5k9nXMtBM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: How to build Azure Workbooks using logs and parameters | Azure Portal Series
topItems.excerpt: Discover how to use Azure Workbooks as a visualization tool for #AzureMonitor. Build an interactive, repeatable narrative to monitor your #Azure environment from apps to infrastructure beyond the insights. In an earlier video: https://youtu.be/Z5xRyy3HB8U, we covered how to build workbooks using Azure
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/EC7n1Oo6D-o" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: AI business school for financial services
value.excerpt: Learn to develop an enterprise AI strategy to create business value in financial services, including machine learning technologies, and culture.

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
topItems.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an enterprise AI strategy that creates real business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in financial services
topItems.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an AI strategy in financial services that creates business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

topItems.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
topItems.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in finance
topItems.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise finance organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

value.title: Architect API integration in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to architect API integration in Azure, and provide secure, scalable API access for your applications.

topItems.title: Publish and manage your APIs with Azure API Management
topItems.excerpt: Learn about using an Azure API gateway to share APIs with partners, and how to use subscription keys to control access to your APIs.

topItems.title: Improve the performance of an API by adding a caching policy in Azure API Management
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure API Management to change an API without rewriting code to enable you to apply a caching policy to a GET operation for quicker response.

topItems.title: Protect your APIs on Azure API Management
topItems.excerpt: Protect your back-end APIs from information exposure and implement throttling to prevent resource exhaustion with policies in Azure API Management.

topItems.title: Control authentication for your APIs with Azure API Management
topItems.excerpt: Discover how to protect your APIs from unauthorized use with API keys and client certificate authentication.

value.title: AZ-400: Develop a Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) strategy
value.excerpt: Sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products and prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
topItems.excerpt: Learn about SRE, an engineering discipline that helps you sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

topItems.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

topItems.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging
topItems.excerpt: Learn about how to capture trace output from your Azure web apps. View a live log stream and download logs files for offline analysis.

topItems.title: Manage site reliability
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

value.title: AZ-400: Manage source control
value.excerpt: Use GitHub to build a modern source control strategy and prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to GitHub
topItems.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

topItems.title: Migrate your repository by using GitHub best practices
topItems.excerpt: Learn to move your existing project to GitHub from a legacy version control system.

topItems.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices
topItems.excerpt: Learn to upload your existing project to GitHub.

topItems.title: Manage repository changes by using pull requests on GitHub
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage changes to your repository source by using pull requests.

value.title: Build AI solutions with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning is a cloud platform for training, deploying, managing, and monitoring machine learning models. Learn how to use the Azure Machine Learning Python SDK to create enterprise-ready machine learning solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to the Azure Machine Learning SDK
topItems.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning provides a cloud-based platform for training, deploying, and managing machine learning models.

topItems.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

topItems.title: Work with Data in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to work with datastores and datasets in Azure Machine Learning.

topItems.title: Work with Compute in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage compute contexts for experiments in Azure Machine Learning.

value.title: Cloud-native security operations with Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: This learning path describes basic architecture, core capabilities, and primary use cases of its products. You'll also learn about differences and Get familiar with Azure Sentinel, a cloud-native, security information and event management (SIEM) service.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Sentinel
topItems.excerpt: Get familiar with Azure Sentinel, a cloud-native, security information and event management (SIEM) service.

topItems.title: Deploy Azure Sentinel and connect data sources
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to deploy Azure Sentinel and connect the services you want to monitor. Then you can use Azure and AI to provide analysis of security alerts.

topItems.title: Threat detection with Azure Sentinel analytics
topItems.excerpt: Threat detection with Azure Sentinel analytics

topItems.title: Security incident management in Azure Sentinel
topItems.excerpt: Security incident management in Azure Sentinel

value.title: Create an enterprise-scale architecture in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore how to create Azure landing zone architecture at enterprise scale.

topItems.title: Introduction to enterprise-scale landing zones in the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
topItems.excerpt: The Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure provides many landing zone options. In this module, we'll focus on enterprise-scale landing zones.

topItems.title: Enterprise-scale architecture organizational design principles
topItems.excerpt: Enterprise-scale architecture organizational design principles

topItems.title: Enterprise-scale architecture networking design principles
topItems.excerpt: Enterprise-scale architecture networking design principles

topItems.title: Enterprise-scale architecture operational design principles
topItems.excerpt: Enterprise-scale architecture operational design principles

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value across industries
value.excerpt: Learn to develop an enterprise AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing, healthcare, financial services, retail, education, and Government.

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
topItems.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an enterprise AI strategy that creates real business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in financial services
topItems.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an AI strategy in financial services that creates business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in government
topItems.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in Government that creates value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in education
topItems.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in education that creates value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Deploy and manage resources in Azure by using ARM templates
value.excerpt: Learn how ARM templates enable you to manage both basic and complex infrastructure deployments on Azure.

topItems.title: Deploy consistent infrastructure in Azure by using Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates
topItems.excerpt: Write Azure Resource Manager templates by using Visual Studio Code to deploy your infrastructure to Azure consistently and reliably.

topItems.title: Deploy to multiple Azure environments by using ARM templates
topItems.excerpt: Manage multiple Azure environment deployments of your Azure Resource Manager templates by using functions, variables, tags, and parameter files.

topItems.title: Validate your deployments by using what-if and the ARM template test toolkit
topItems.excerpt: Leverage the ARM template test toolkit and apply it on your Azure Resource Manager templates to ensure the templates follow good practices before deployment. Apply the what-if command to see the impact of a deployment before it's applied.

topItems.title: Deploy modular and reusable ARM templates from the command line and by using GitHub Actions
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to deploy Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates by using Azure PowerShell, the Azure CLI, and from GitHub Actions.

value.title: Deploy applications with Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure release pipelines that continuously build, test, and deploy your applications.

topItems.title: Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Set up a continuous delivery (CD) pipeline that automates the process of deploying your application.

topItems.title: Create a multistage pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Design and create a realistic release pipeline that promotes changes to various testing and staging environments.

topItems.title: Manage database changes in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Use a release approval in Azure Pipelines to help coordinate database schema changes between developers and database administrators.

topItems.title: Run functional tests in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Run Selenium UI tests, a form of functional testing, in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Discover ways to foster an AI-ready culture in your business
value.excerpt: Learn AI solutions to implement based upon organization maturity and a framework to drive the key changes that are necessary to become an AI-ready organization.

topItems.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
topItems.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in finance
topItems.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise finance organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in marketing
topItems.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise marketing organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in sales
topItems.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise sales organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

value.title: Foundations of data science
value.excerpt: Learn python programming and data science together with UC Berkeley's data 8: foundations of data science course

topItems.title: Learn the data science method
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the history and motivation behind data science

topItems.title: Introduction to Python using the datascience library
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Python expressions, functions, basic data types(numbers, strings), and comparisons

topItems.title: Create and manipulate tables using the datascience library
topItems.excerpt: Learn the basics of table manipulation in the datascience library

topItems.title: Design and plot graphs in Python
topItems.excerpt: Learn

value.title: Implement Microsoft identity – Associate
value.excerpt: The Microsoft identity platform is an evolution of the Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) developer platform. It allows developers to build applications that sign in users, and access resources in both external applications such as Microsoft Office 365, the Azure portal, and thousands of other SaaS applications and internal resources, such as apps on your corporate network and intranet, along with any cloud apps developed by your own organization. Learn how to utilize Microsoft identity in your custom applications.

topItems.title: Getting Started with Microsoft Identity
topItems.excerpt: Learn the basics of Microsoft identity including the different types of tokens, account types, and supported topologies.

topItems.title: Application types in Microsoft identity
topItems.excerpt: Learn how developers can leverage Microsoft identity in different types of applications.

topItems.title: Permissions and Consent Framework
topItems.excerpt: Learn the basics of Microsoft identity including the different types of tokens, account types, and supported topologies.

topItems.title: Secure custom APIs with Microsoft Identity
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to secure a web API with Microsoft identity and how to call it from another application.

value.title: Process natural language with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Process natural language with Azure Cognitive Language Services

topItems.title: Add basic conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: Learn to identify valuable information in conversations with LUIS for interpreting user goals (intents) and distill valuable information from sentences (entities).

topItems.title: Manage your Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) Apps
topItems.excerpt: Learn to manage LUIS apps through versioning, key management, handling data, and improving predictions.

topItems.title: Use containers for your Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) Apps
topItems.excerpt: The Language Understanding (LUIS) container loads your trained or published Language Understanding model. As a LUIS app, the docker container provides access to the query predictions from the container's API endpoints

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Create a Windows virtual machine in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn to create an Azure virtual machine in minutes that can be used like a local physical desktop or server.

value.title: Create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Describe concepts of relational data
value.excerpt: Describe concepts of relational data

value.title: How to create an Azure SQL database | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to create an Azure SQL Database in the Azure Portal and how you can be more productive in Azure.    Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com   Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal

value.title: Automate your workflow with GitHub Actions
value.excerpt: Learn how GitHub Actions enables you to automate your software development cycle and deploy applications to Azure.

topItems.title: Introduction to GitHub
topItems.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

topItems.title: Automate development tasks by using GitHub Actions
topItems.excerpt: Create a basic GitHub Action and use that action in a workflow.

topItems.title: Build continuous integration (CI) workflows by using GitHub Actions
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create workflows that enable you to use Continuous Integration (CI) for your projects.

topItems.title: Build and deploy applications to Azure by using GitHub Actions
topItems.excerpt: Create two deployment workflows using GitHub Actions and Microsoft Azure.

value.title: Azure Static Web Apps
value.excerpt: Azure Static Web Apps is a modern web app service that offers streamlined full-stack development from source code to global high availability.

topItems.title: Publish an Angular, React, Svelte, or Vue JavaScript app with Azure Static Web Apps
topItems.excerpt: Publish an Angular, React, Svelte, or Vue JavaScript app with Azure Static Web Apps. Use Visual Studio Code to create and run the web app locally.

topItems.title: Publish an API to Azure Static Web Apps
topItems.excerpt: Publish an Angular, React, Svelte, or Vue JavaScript app and API with Azure Static Web Apps and Azure Functions. Deploy your code from GitHub to a staging site using preview URLs.

topItems.title: Publish a Blazor WebAssembly app and .NET API with Azure Static Web Apps
topItems.excerpt: Publish a Blazor WebAssembly app and .NET API with Azure Static Web Apps

topItems.title: Create and publish a static web app with Gatsby and Azure Static Web Apps
topItems.excerpt: Use Gatsby to develop and compile a static web app, then deploy it to the web with Azure Static Web Apps.

value.title: Build automated workflows to integrate data and apps with Azure Logic Apps
value.excerpt: This learning path guides you through creation of serverless workflows for your organization using Azure Logic Apps, a cloud service that automates your business processes.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Logic Apps
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to evaluate Logic Apps as an automation choice for your organization using criteria for integration, performance, conditionals, and connectors.

topItems.title: Route and process data automatically using Logic Apps
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to define a workflow to run your business with Logic apps using built-in triggers, actions, and conditional operators.

topItems.title: Call an API from a Logic Apps workflow using a custom connector
topItems.excerpt: In this module, learn to create a Logic Apps custom connector to call an API from a Logic Apps workflow.

topItems.title: Create and deploy Logic Apps using Azure Resource Manager templates
topItems.excerpt: Define a Logic Apps workflow declaratively as a Resource Manager template and deploy the app using the Azure Command Line Interface (CLI).

value.title: Build data analytics solutions using Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools
value.excerpt: Build data analytics solutions using Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools

topItems.title: Explore Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools capabilities
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools capabilities

topItems.title: Query data in the lake using Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools
topItems.excerpt: Query data in the lake using Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools

topItems.title: Create metadata objects in Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools
topItems.excerpt: Create metadata objects in Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools

topItems.title: Use Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools for transforming the data in the lake
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools for transforming the data in the lake

value.title: Build JavaScript applications with Node.js
value.excerpt: Node.js provides a large set of built-in APIs that help you build various types of applications, command-line apps, web apps, and more. It also offers testing and debugging capabilities and a rich ecosystem of third-party packages that you can easily add to your application.

topItems.title: Introduction to Node.js
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Node.js: what it is, how it works, and when to use it. Create Node.js applications using JavaScript/TypeScript using Visual Studio Code.

topItems.title: Create a new Node.js project and work with dependencies
topItems.excerpt: Create a Node.js project and learn to add packages and manage package dependencies in your project. Use the NPM CLI and registry to add libraries and tools to your JavaScript/TypeScript applications using Visual Studio Code.

topItems.title: Interactively debug Node.js apps with the built-in and Visual Studio Code debuggers
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to efficiently debug your Node.js app by using Visual Studio Code to fix your bugs quickly. Use the interactive debugger within Visual Studio Code to analyze and fix your JavaScript/TypeScript applications.

topItems.title: Work with files and directories in a Node.js app
topItems.excerpt: Build an app that manipulates files and directories with Node.js and JavaScript.

value.excerpt: Building Open Source Software (OSS) Analytics Solutions with Azure HDInsight

topItems.title: Introduction to the Open source Analytics Offering
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to the Open source Analytics Offering

topItems.title: Choose the correct HDInsight Configuration to build open-source analytics solutions
topItems.excerpt: Choose the correct HDInsight Configuration to build open-source analytics solutions

topItems.title: Creating and configuring a HDInsight cluster
topItems.excerpt: Creating and configuring a HDInsight Cluster

topItems.title: Run Petabyte level OSS NoSQL databases with HDInsight HBase
topItems.excerpt: Run Petabyte level OSS NoSQL databases with HDInsight HBase
